# Your answers {.tabset}

## Duck check-in

```{r}
duck <- read_csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRiq9xggASJOtZCW1lxDO6snw5ViicSjt2nrAD_FWmvLRnQH45XkoRCGrJbHBal2V3TSY-nf43ZySYh/pub?output=csv")

duck %>% 
  rename(n = 2) %>% 
  mutate(n = parse_number(as.character(n))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = n))+
  geom_bar(color = colors[3]) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("Which inflatable duck are you today?") +
  labs(x = "Duck number")
```
